name: Capoeira Angola Palmares
notes: Marion-Carbondale area, South Illinois. Monitor Pirata Negro (Donovon Miller): "I moved to South Illinois [Marion-Carbondale area] to further my career in engineering awhile back. I've been focusing more on what pays the bills more than Capoeira in the last year, but i'm feeling that itch again. Anyone interested in training in this area get at me at capoeiranola@gmail.com" SOURCE: offline capoeira forum post 4/27/13
rawRecord:
Marion


      Capoeira Angola Palmares
 Monitor Pirata Negro  "Donovon Miller"
